title: 服务器TPS爆低timings 查出来是Full Server Tick
author: Mc_Hyz

replies.author: Azitate
replies.txt_content:
Mc_Hyz 发表于 2020-2-23 20:16
DL你这个页面在哪看的呢我想进去了解了解
这里显示的不是你卡服的原因，full server tick是指服务器所有事件能耗统计的总和
你服大眼看了下还是在跑图和几个指令处理上的消耗比较大,可以考虑加点优化插件

replies.author: Azitate
replies.txt_content:
Full Server Tick是指

Full Server Tick is the best representation of your servers performance, in the Pct Tick Column. If this value hits 100%, then your server is unable to keep up and will begin losing TPS. There is no magical solution to improving Full Server Tick, it is merely provided to see a better summary of your overall server performance and you can improve it by improving other timings on your server such as entities and plugins.复制代码
